brief.brief: This form enables you to specify the operations to run when the user presses an option key.
Additional Options are similar to subroutines, except that Service Manager runs the additional options when you press an option key and it runs subroutines automatically on specified operations.
You can define the full set of option keys to call any Service Manager subroutine created through Rapid Application Development (RAD).

You must indicate the application name, the list of parameter names and their corresponding values to pass to the application, and the message Service Manager displays to the user in the case of error.
